35645.……何も 反応がない。\n詩歌の守り手は 動かないようだ。\n<br>\n<pc:
Elegiac Crablet seemed to be motionless. read the words on the stone monument on Elegiac
Crablet's back. O psalm-seeker! If you have royal blood, the cracks of psalms will be heard in your ears. The cracks
of grace will nurture abundant life. The cracks of eternity freeze even the flowing time. Momentary cracks will
awaken the sleeping time. Let three psalms be engraved on your hearts. It is the soul of our Weddie.
